predicate.note: Frames file for 'tune' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: passive
example.text: In a Madrid hotel room recently , a viewer caught the end of a badly acted series about a fishing boat on Australia 's Great Barrier Reef , [*-2] only to be urged [*-6] by the British announcer [*-3] to `` stay [*-4] tuned [*-5] for the further adventures of Skippy the Kangaroo . ''
example.arg: the further adventures of Skippy the Kangaroo

roleset.name: to adjust the controls on a radio or television

example.name: transitive
example.text: You now may drop by the Voice of America offices in Washington and read the text of what the Voice is broadcasting [*T*-1] to those 130 million people around the world who [*T*-20] tune in to it each week .
